 9 module Icalendar
10 
11   class Calendar < Component
12     ical_component :events, :todos, :journals, :freebusys, :timezones
13 
14     ical_property :calscale, :calendar_scale
15     ical_property :prodid, :product_id
16     ical_property :version
17     ical_property :ip_method
18 
19     def initialize()
20       super("VCALENDAR")
21 
22       # Set some defaults
23       self.calscale = "GREGORIAN"    # Who knows, but this is the only one in the spec.
24       self.prodid = "iCalendar-Ruby" # Current product... Should be overwritten
25       self.version = "2.0" # Version of the specification
26     end
27 
28     def event(&block)
29       e = Event.new
30       self.add_component e
31 
32       e.instance_eval &block if block
33 
34       e
35     end
36 
37     def todo(&block)
38       e = Todo.new
39       self.add_component e
40 
41       e.instance_eval &block if block
42 
43       e
44     end
45 
46     def journal(&block)
47       e = Journal.new
48       self.add_component e
49 
50       e.instance_eval &block if block
51 
52       e
53     end
54 
55     def freebusy(&block)
56       e = Freebusy.new
57       self.add_component e
58 
59       e.instance_eval &block if block
60 
61       e
62     end
63 
64     def timezone(&block)
65       e = Timezone.new
66       self.add_component e
67 
68       e.instance_eval &block if block
69 
70       e
71     end
72     
73     # The "PUBLISH" method in a "VEVENT" calendar component is an
74     # unsolicited posting of an iCalendar object. Any CU may add published
75     # components to their calendar. The "Organizer" MUST be present in a
76     # published iCalendar component. "Attendees" MUST NOT be present. Its
77     # expected usage is for encapsulating an arbitrary event as an
78     # iCalendar object. The "Organizer" may subsequently update (with
79     # another "PUBLISH" method), add instances to (with an "ADD" method),
80     # or cancel (with a "CANCEL" method) a previously published "VEVENT"
81     # calendar component.
82     def publish
83       ip_method = "PUBLISH"
84 
85     end
86 
87   end # class Calendar
